message:
Today's QOTD is superhero flavored. What superpower would you rather have and why? The power of flight (that's levitation, homes*) or the power of invisibility?

* - please someone get this reference...
Personally, I'd love the power to fly. Being invisible makes you open to hearing what people really think about you...and I sure as hell don't need that. :)  What about you?
Now I want to listen to The D! Flight all the way, though I'd prefer the ability to kill a yak at 200 yards away ...with MIND BULLETS.
of the two, I think I'd rather have flight
if I could pick any super hero ability though, I'd go with mind control or persuasion... like jedi mind tricks!
I think that would be the most effective power :D

I would want the ability to basicly slow time to the point of almost stopping for everyone but me and anyone I am touching. So I could have time to think, learn stuff, walk to work, and it would look like the ability to teleport to others.
Wasn't there a show like that called 'my dad was an alien' or something, when a girl could stop time?
OMG Burt Reynolds was her dad's voice?!
@leah the force is strong with this one! ;p
Of the 2, I think I'm going to have to go flight.
